input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product features and product specification below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product specification:
Lumisol Solar Color Dragonfly Pool Light

Product features:
Charged by the sun during the day.
Dragonfly automatically illuminates and changes color at night
Color-changing LED (Red, Green, Blue)
Perfect for decorating and lighting your garden, pond, and/or pool
Rechargeable battery included
Light will operate 6 to 8 hours after a full charge
environmentally friendly,energy-saving, reduces carbon emission
3.94 x 5.63 x 5.12 inches.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This is a solar-powered dragonfly-shaped pool light that changes colors automatically at night! It is environmentally friendly, energy-saving, and reduces carbon emissions. The rechargeable battery lasts for up to 8 hours after a full charge. The size is 3.94 x 5.63 x 5.12 inches. You will love the color-changing LED and how it illuminates your outdoor space!
input_text.Response B: Want to transform your outdoor space into a captivating oasis? Look no further than the Lumisol Solar Color Dragonfly Pool Light! With its color-changing LED and rechargeable battery, this light is perfect for decorating and lighting your garden, pond, and/or pool. The environmentally friendly and energy-saving light is charged by the sun during the day, so you can enjoy its automatic illumination and color-changing magic for up to 6-8 hours after a full charge. Measuring only 3.94 x 5.63 x 5.12 inches, this light is easy to use and install, and will reduce your carbon emission. Get your hands on the Lumisol Solar Color Dragonfly Pool Light today and take your outdoor space to the next level!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
